Class ControllerTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • TestParentClass
      • ControllerTest
  • public class ControllerTest
extends TestParentClass
    This class contains tests for the Controller.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void testAController_CreatePortfolio()
      This test checks the creation of portfolio.
      void testBController_ViewPortfolio()
      This test checks the output for view portfolio on certain date.
      void testCController_WithoutBuyingAnythingNoPortfolioCreated()
      This test checks that portfolio is not created, if user doesn't buy any stock.
      void testDController_ClubTwoStocksOfSameTickerComposition()
      This test checks two stocks of same ticker symbol that are bought on same day and is seen combined in the view portfolio.
      void testEController_ClubTwoStocksOfSameTickerComposition2()
      This test checks two stocks of same ticker symbol that are bought on different day and is seen combined in the view portfolio.
      void testFController_OverrideSamePortfolio()
      This test checks how the same name portfolio gets overridden.
      void testGController_InputDate()
      This test checks portfolio stocks after inputting some previous date.
      void testHController_InputDate2()
      This test checks portfolio stocks after inputting some previous date.
      void testIController_InvalidDate()
      This test displays message when wrong input date is given by the user.
      void testJController_InvalidDate2()
      This test displays message when wrong input date is given by the user.
      void testKController_InvalidDate3FutureDate()
      This test displays message when a future date is given by the user.
      void testLController_EnterInvalidOptionForSelectingPortfolio()
      This test displays an invalid message when the user inputs wrong option for selecting portfolio.
      void testMController_EnterFutureDateForPurchase()
      This test displays an invalid message when the user inputs future date on purchase.
      void testNController_EnterInvalidDateForPurchase()
      This test displays an invalid message when the user inputs invalid date on purchase.
      void testOController_EnterInvalidDateForAdd()
      This test displays an invalid message when the user inputs invalid date on adding to existing portfolio.
      void testPController_EnterFutureDateForSell()
      This test displays an invalid message when the user inputs future date while selling.
      void testQController_EnterInvalidDateForSell()
      This test displays an invalid message when the user inputs invalid date while selling.
      void testRController_InvalidInitialChoice()
      This test displays an invalid message when the user inputs wrong option for initial choice of inputs.
      void testSController_InvalidInputs()
      This test tests set of all invalid inputs.
      void testSOController_HowManyStocksIsZeroSoPortfolioNotCreated()
      This test displays no portfolio creation if the number of stocks inputted by the user is zero.
      void testTController_HowManyStocksIsZeroSoStockNotDisplayedInPortfolio()
      This test does not display the entry inside the portfolio when the number of stocks inputted by the user is zero.
      void testUController_4StocksBoughtByTheUser()
      This test displays 4 stocks bought by user.
      void testVController_5ByTheUser()
      This test displays 5 stocks bought by user on different dates.
      void testWController_10StocksBoughtByUser()
      This test displays 10 stocks bought by user.
      void testXController_InitialChoiceExit()
      This test takes initial input as exit.
      void testYController_InvalidHowMany()
      This test tests for large input for the number of stocks.
      void testZAController_ViewPortfolioAndEnterWrongOption()
      This test throws error message when user inputs wrong option for displaying portfolio from a list of portfolio.
      void testZBController_ValueOfPortfolioEnterWrongPortfolioNumber()
      This test throws error message when user inputs wrong option for displaying portfolio from a list of portfolio.
      void testZCController_BuyStockEnterWrongStockOption()
      This test displays an invalid input message when user enters invalid entry while buying stock.
      void testZController_StringEmptyForName()
      This test throws a message when portfolio name is an empty string.
      void testZDController_BuyStockEnterInvalidHowManyStocks()
      This test displays an invalid input message when user enters invalid entry while entering number of stocks.
      void testZEController_ToggleBetweenMainMenuAndBack()
      This test checks the operations of back and main menu.
      void testZFController_BuyAndSell1()
      This test checks when stock purchased on a specifc date and sold the same stock at a later date.
      void testZGController_BuyAndSell2()
      This test throws a message when stock purchased on a specific date and sold the same stock at a previous date than that of the purchase.
      void testZHController_BuyAndSell3()
      This test checks the combinations of stocks purchased while creating portfolio, stocks added and sold.

      This test checks value of portfolio (option 2) on various dates for portfolio controllerTest90.

      This test checks value of portfolio on full composition (option 3) on various dates for portfolio controllerTest90.

      This test adds stock to the current portfolio.

      This test sells stocks from current portfolio.

      This test checks value portfolio on certain date for past date.

      This test checks performance by year.

      This test creates portfolio.

      This test checks by day.

      This test checks performance invalid year,or month or day or invalid range.

      This test checks the value portfolio (option 2 on various dates).

      This test checks Value of portfolio on full composition on certain date for past date.
      void testZZGController_ChecksInvestmentsOnPreviousDates()
      This test checks total investments on previous dates.
      void testZZHController_InvestmentsOnCertainDate()
      This test checks total amount invested on certain date.
      void testZZIController_PurchasedAndSoldAlreadySoldStocks()
      This test checks when a purchase and sell takes place of a particular stock and there are no stocks left to be sold.
      void testZZJController_SellStocksHigherThanPurchased()
      This test checks when a purchase and sell takes place of a particular stock where the number of stocks sold is greater and there are no stocks left to be sold.
      void testZZLController_InflexiblePortfolio()
      This test checks if after selling 8 stocks for available 10 stocks , correct quantity is being displayed in the view option.
      void testZZLController_UserInputtingCommissionFeesAndDisplayingOutput()
      This test takes commission fee as input from user and displays the total amount invested based on the input entered.
      void testZZMController_UserInputtingCommissionFeesAndDisplayingOutput2()
      This test takes commission fee as input from user and displays the total amount invested based on the input entered.
      void testZZNController_UserInputtingInvalidCommissionFeesAndDisplayingOutput()
      This test takes input as invalid commission fee from the user and throws message as the fee must be greater than 0.
      void testZZOController_InflexiblePortfolio2()
      This test checks inflexible portfolio.
